* BrightBlade looked over at Lightmare and then at the pear she had offered 
her, she had taken it and looked it over carefully before she threw it over 
she shoulder and continued to walk towards the base. She wasn't hungry and 
she wasn't about to accept a meal from a bot who wanted her dead, she was 
sure of it.
BrightBlade continued to walk towards the base until her scanners suddenly 
informed her that Hell Beast had moved away from it and had come to the 
Maximal base.*

" WHAT?!"

*She said to the info that her scanners reported but had just happened to 
say it a bit too loud. She looked over at Gangon.*

" Hell Beast had gone to the Maximal base, along with most of team."

* Her tone was shocked and a bit suspicious at the same time, obviously 
there had to be a logical reason for it.
BrightBlade looked off into the distance and towards that Maximal base, if 
Hell Beast was there with half of the Predacons that she was going to be 
there too.
She looked back at Gangon but kept her eyes off Lightmare, something that 
she liked to do best. With that she then began to run/limp off towards the 
enemy base, opening her com-link to Hell Beast.*

" My Lord, I am only about 9 clicks from the enemy base and your position. 
If there are no orders to do other wise I would like to join you. 
BrightBlade out."
